scripts.docker:logs:api: docker logs $(docker ps | grep  ' api' | awk '{ print $1 }')
scripts.docker:logs:web: docker logs $(docker ps | grep  ' web' | awk '{ print $1 }')
scripts.docker:logs-f:api: docker logs $(docker ps | grep  ' api' | awk '{ print $1 }') -f
scripts.docker:logs-f:web: docker logs $(docker ps | grep  ' web' | awk '{ print $1 }') -f
scripts.docker:container-remove: docker image rm api -f && docker image rm web -f
scripts.docker:image-remove: docker image rm api -f && docker image rm web -f
